label: applicableGoodsCharacteristic
comment: A distinguishing material feature applicable to this trade product instance.
A material goods characteristic applicable to this trade product.
Material goods characteristic applicable to this supply chain packaging.

rangeIncludes.comment: A distinguishing feature or quality of goods.

domainIncludes.comment: Any wrapping or containment, such as a box or a barrel, of goods.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process.
An instance of an individual product or batch of similar products produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process.
